interest: Literature, Australian literature.  Environmental, cultural and postcolonial Australian histories  especially of rural and remote areas.Theoretical approaches to the post-human, to representation of habitat, of non-human and human relations in culture and literature.Changing perceptions of 'nature' in the context of the Anthropocene and environmental crises.The practices of environmental conservation.
